EmailTemplate.name: National - Vendor Application
EmailTemplate.subject: DealChicken - Vendor Application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi,
Thank you for your interest in partnering with DealChicken. We are reviewing your information to ensure we can create a promotion that delivers measurable results and achieves your business goals.
If you have not done so already, please make sure we have the following information to expedite review of your application:
Company Name (please include your Corporation type) Address (No P.O. Boxes please) City State Zip Phone Business owner (full name please)
Weâ€™ll be in touch soon.
The DealChicken team
